LanguageData.AvaliBasicBionicArm.label: Basic bionic arm
LanguageData.AvaliBasicBionicArm.description: A basic bionic arm. It isn't much better, but it's not too bad.
LanguageData.AvaliAdvancedBionicArm.label: Advanced bionic arm
LanguageData.AvaliAdvancedBionicArm.description: An advanced bionic arm, featuring better self repair systems, and a direct neural connection to the users brain, allowing it to do almost exactly what they want in a very precise manner.
